selectedVerses.text: And they answered, "John the Baptist. But others say, Elijah, and others, that one of the prophets of old has risen."
But lately my people have risen up as an enemy; you strip the rich robe from those who pass by trustingly with no thought of war.

Now the LORD has fulfilled his promise that he made. For I have risen in the place of David my father and sit on the throne of Israel, as the LORD promised, and I have built the house for the name of the LORD, the God of Israel.
but if the sun has risen on him, there shall be bloodguilt for him. He shall surely pay. If he has nothing, then he shall be sold for his theft.
saying, "The Lord has risen indeed, and has appeared to Simon!"
